name: Dungeon Twine - 10 Steps Edition
description:
A emoji-based point and click puzzle adventure where you need to get to the top  of  a dungeon by finding keys, opening chest and scrolling walls.

You can walk up to 10 steps before losing 1 health point(❤️). No health You die(💔).

Eat food to recover health, Think non-linear...

Game mode is Permadeath. (once you die you start again from the beginning).

My entry for "Twine 10 Year Anniversary Jam"

Enjoy
